Move Line

Click here to see this page in full context

Maximize screen to view table of contents*

Back Forward

Move Line

Select the line and drag to a new position.

Or,

On the Home tab, select the Arrows Keys Nudge. Use the keyboard arrow keys to move the line to its new position.

Move line with precision

Right click on the Line and select Line Properties. The Line Definition dialog box will open.

Edit the lines depth and x-position in the Start and End Point Attributes.

Click OK.

Resize line

Select the line and use the grab handles to change the line size and position.
